artist: Maker: John Brown Bell; Maker: Frederick Brasted
creditline: Gift of Mr. Harold J. Pond
description: teapot, floral chased bullet design, matching wooden box
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of body.  Maker\'s mark, lion passant, and date letter on underside of lid.  Maker\'s mark, lion passant, and sovereign\'s head on handle.  Lion passant and sovereign\'s head on finial.  Lion passant and sovereign\'s head on wing nut securing finial.
title: Teapot
